title: GuruWear
description: Download or create your own interactive formulas for Android Wear smartwatch: guided workouts, DIY instructions, emergency guidance, cooking recipes, tutorials, etc.Genuine idea that is made for smartwatch and works best on smartwatch!Leverage unique features of wearable devices, including on-wrist vibrations, ambient mode, built-in pedometer, bluetooth audio, hands-free experience and more. Use it anytime and anywhere thanks to completely standalone engine (don't depend on your phone).Track your workouts with built-in Google Fit support!Called "Tasker for the human being!". Great for:- building new habits- going through complex procedures- learning new things- managing your routines (training plans or any other)GuruWear formulas: - step by step plan, procedure or recipe- designed and engineered specifically for wearable devices. - unobtrusive, helpful assistant or guide- countless applicationsVisit www.guruwear.net for more info!
descriptionHTML:
Download or create your own interactive formulas for Android Wear smartwatch: guided workouts, DIY instructions, emergency guidance, cooking recipes, tutorials, etc.

Genuine idea that is made for smartwatch and works best on smartwatch!

Leverage unique features of wearable devices, including on-wrist vibrations, ambient mode, built-in pedometer, bluetooth audio, hands-free experience and more.
Use it anytime and anywhere thanks to completely standalone engine (don't depend on your phone).

Track your workouts with built-in Google Fit support!


Called "Tasker for the human being!". Great for:
- building new habits
- going through complex procedures
- learning new things
- managing your routines (training plans or any other)


GuruWear formulas:
- step by step plan, procedure or recipe
- designed and engineered specifically for wearable devices.
- unobtrusive, helpful assistant or guide
- countless applications


Visit www.guruwear.net for more info!
comments: One of the most useful apps to have on your wrist! Take the time to create your own recipes and you will see the beauty of this app. Love that you can even use your own images, as graphics on the watch make more sense than tiny walls of text. Hope development continues. This app will benefit immensely from partnering up with popular sites like instructables, pinterest, etsy and the like for sharing recipes. Reserving a star for more features, material design, and app/website integrations!
I couldn't use it with my gear s3 because it said that it needed one or more services installed that were mot available.
I've purchased the version from the samsung store but i can't install the formulas on my watch. I've emailed you about it to no reply. I have to give a 1 star for that unfortunately.
very good 非常好，很有创意，用户可以选择安装不同的功能

I purchased the app via the Samsung Store and I am unable to install the formulas on my Gear S3.  I have written to the makers but they have not replied to me.  Will be complaining to Samsung and will ask for a refund.  Don't get this app if you have a Gear phone, it doesn't work
recentChanges: - ability to run formulas also on mobile device (beta)
